H0.text: In which European city is Kurtfurstendamm the main shopping street. Berlin

H1.text: In which European city is Kurtfurstendamm the main shopping street. Vienna

H2.text: In which European city is Kurtfurstendamm the main shopping street. Munich

H3.text: In which European city is Kurtfurstendamm the main shopping street. DEBER

A4.text: The Kurfürstendamm is one of the most famous avenues in Berlin.

A5.text: After World War II, the Kurfürstendamm became the leading commercial street of West Berlin during the Wirtschaftswunder days.
